Select Country Select Country Edit Profile Customize your local Profile page. Set profile and banner images, update displayed name and bio, and select your top 4 favorite movies. Export App Data Export your App data as backup or to transfer it to another device. You can find the exported zip file in the download folder of your device. Data was exported Export Export Data Export your Logline App data locally as a ZIP file containing up to three separate .db files. Retrieve the file from your downloads folder and utilize it for backup purposes or to transfer your data to another device. File Name: logline_backup_yyyy-MM-dd_HH-mm-ss.zip Import Database "Import a previously exported ZIP file, to restore backed-up data. The import file should be a ZIP archive containing up to 3 .db files. This Process will restart your app." Warning Please note that the current app data will be permanently replaced after the import process is completed! Import Data Country for Watch Providers Select your country to access streaming, rental, and purchase options customized specifically for this location on the movie page.
